title: New Imperialism
summary: New Imperialism was the process of European nations reasserting their dominance over the world. This was done through the colonization of Africa in the %{Scramble for Africa#Scramble for Africa} and in Asia, with the establishment of #{spheres of influence} in places like China. There where economic and social motives seen in the ideology of %{Social Darwinism#Social Darwinism}.
